ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule on Check object where If Status = Printed, then the value cannot be changed to voided.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c),"printed"), ISCHANGED(Status__c), NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') ), !$Permission.DLSE_Sr_Cashier, !$Permission.Cashiering_Disbursing )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once status has been changed to printed the value of this field cannot be changed.
